revised_title: Description of a Newly-Discovered Young of the Ornithorhynchus paradoxus
tldr: Sir Richard Owen describes a newly-discovered young of the Ornithorhynchus paradoxus, an unusual monotreme native to Australia. The embryo is preserved in alcohol and provides valuable information about the early development of this unique mammal. Owen hopes to receive more specimens for further study and refers to his previous work on the species.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Zoology > Mammalogy
